# Reference

<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

### Classes

#### Public Classes

* [`clevis`](#clevis): Clevis is a pluggable framework for automated decryption

#### Private Classes

* `clevis::hook`: clevis::hook class used by clevis main class only.
* `clevis::install`: clevis::install class used by clevis main class only.

## Classes

### <a name="clevis"></a>`clevis`

It can be used to provide automate decryption of data
or even automated unlocking of LUKS volumes

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include clevis
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `clevis` class:

* [`package_name`](#-clevis--package_name)

##### <a name="-clevis--package_name"></a>`package_name`

Data type: `Array[String[1]]`

Array of package names to install

Default value: `['clevis', 'clevis-luks', 'clevis-dracut']`
